org.hps.monitoring.drivers.headless

Class SvtSensorOccHeadless

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.util.Driver
      • org.hps.monitoring.drivers.headless.SvtSensorOccHeadless

  • public class SvtSensorOccHeadless
extends Driver
    This Driver makes plots of SVT sensor occupancies across a run. 6/6/19: modified this to work with SVT upgrade including "L0"; separated all plotters into 2 so that we have one page for L1-4 and one for L5-7 6/2/21: mg based on org.hps.monitoring.drivers.svt.SensorOccupancyPlotsDriver but removed all plot formating for new headless monitoring app

    • Nested Class Summary

        Driver.AbortRunException, Driver.NextEventException

        private Hep3Vector getStripPosition(HpsSiSensor sensor,

        physicalChannel - : physical channel number
        Returns:
